item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")
				|| playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) {
			try {
				final String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					final int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					final int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong input, ::item ID AMMOUNT");
				}
			} catch (final Exception e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}

item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

[code=java]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)||playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”) && c.playerRights >= 0)

{
    try
    {
        String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
        if (args.length == 3)
        {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
            for(int i : restrictedItems) {
                if(i == newItemID) {
                    c.sendMessage("Spawning that item is restricted!");
                    return;
                }
            }
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
            if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0))
            {
                c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else
            {
                c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
            }
        } else
        {
            c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
        }
    } catch (Exception e)
    {

    }
}[/code]

Try that.
